title: A pretty broken bug that lost me a game.
body:
Hello Boards! 

I'm moslty adressing this to Riot, but players should know about this aswell.

Darius' Hemmorhage is bugged, extremely. I was playing my dear Riven (only one win out of 6 games sadly, but I'll get there once it stabilizes MMR or I get more skill in my matchups) and my jungler picked Pantheon (considered one of her hardest counters) so the enemy picked Darius. Now, I managed to win lane after some trading with E and potions/lifesteal, but I can't stress it enough how gambreaking Darius' passive is right now. 

His Hemmorhage keeps doing damage after the Hemmorhage ends. I wondered how I could take so much damage from just two stacks when he had nothing, and then I end up fighting him. I kill him but end up fully stacked and low. Ofcourse I Valor under turret and stay there. Valor blocks a ton of the damage, and I watch closely as Hemmorhage ticks away. Valor is gone, so is Hemmorhage. I'm on 60 HP, everything's good. No Hemmorhage, no minion aggro, no more damage. 

SURPRISE MOTHAFOCKA! 

Killed by a last tick of Hemmorhage. And it was two seconds after Hemmorhage supposedly dissapeared (the debuff icon was not showing)

Please Riot, Fix this! And players, beware against Darius'!
